casebody.data:
2002-1881 (La. 10/14/02)

Emma HOBBS v. CALCASIEU PARISH SCHOOL BOARD. No. 2002-C-1881. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Hobbs, Emma H.; — Plaintiff; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Calcasieu, 14th Judicial District Court Div. F, No. 98-5862; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. 02-94.

Denied.
